data.title: The Trusts Arena
data.text:
Centrally located in West Auckland, with easy motorway access, plentiful parking and 15 minutes from the CBD, Arena Functions boasts 7 incredible conference rooms. All rooms offer different sizes, configurations and capacities including the main arena. We have outstanding facilities, world-class catering, excellent event management and skilled, experienced staff that care about you and your guests. Parties and meetings, sit down dinners and conferences, training and team building. We deliver memorable events for our customers and anything is possible!

Our modern fitness centre is well designed, easily accessible, has good natural lighting & is spacious with great views of the park surroundings. Our fitness equipment is state-of-the-art & is well maintained. There are many ancillary facilities such as the indoor sprint track, boxing studio, group fitness studios, arena/basketball court & Olympic outdoor running track available to our members.
